text: Ani imana rakhanarya ani neka kama karanaryanna tya svargaca subha samacara dya, jyancya khali pravaha vahata aheta. Jevha tyanna tyancyatuna phale khanyasa dile jatila, tevha mhanatila ki yacyapurvi amhala khanyasathi heca dile gele. Ti milatijulati phale asatila ani tyancyasathi tyata pavitra sud'dha (silavana) patn'ya asatila ani te tyata nehami nehami rahatila
